body.name: Heavy Duty Broom, Outdoor Brooms, Commercial Broom for Sweeping Indoor, Outside Broom with 55" Long Handle, Angle Brooms for Patio Kitchen Shop Sidewalk - Black and Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 8 mins
features: Point-Lock Thread Shop Broom: No more worries about loosening. With Point-Lock Thread, the upgraded kitchen broom increases the locking force by 30% and makes it more durable and less prone to loosen. The thickened iron pole ensures maximum friction of the threads to enable a tight lock and easy assembly. The service life of the patio brooms is twice as the previous one according to laboratory data.

Clean-friendly Heavy-Duty Brooms: No more bending. These ergonomic 55-inch adjustable concrete brooms are suitable for people of all heights and cleaning needs of different heights. Both ceilings and floors can be used. With soft eva foam, fatigue will set you free. Plus, EVA material can also be effective insulation, no longer worrying about heat or low temperature when using these industrial brooms.

CornerReach Garage Broom Removes 99% Dust: This red broom is 14 inches wide, which equates to covering 1 sq. ft. in a single sweep. The unique CornerReach design increases the degree of bristles and floor fit, providing greater convenience when cleaning corners and sofa bottoms, reducing the effort required to clean the floor, but enjoying the benefits of twice the effort.

Unique Dustbloom Technology for Deep Cleaning: Single purchase, two-way use hard bristle broom obtained. Tiumso 55" broom outdoor features special split-end bristles that increase the contact area between bristles and the floor, effectively capturing tiny dust and particles, reducing indoor sweeping times. With 5 layers of stiff and bristle, smoother sweeping in yard and walkways will be easily delivered. Away from being stuck in concrete.

Versatile Cleaning Tool for Any Surface: Tiumso brooms for sweeping outdoor work great for your house, balcony, sidewalk, warehouse, restaurant or driveways, workshops, basement, lobby, mall, market, and classroom. It can also be used on any surface in your home, including wood, tile, and laminate floors. This efficient cleaning house brooms are a must-have for any household or industrial spaces.
The broom looks used because of the special split-end bristle technology, but it is totally newly designed for fine cleaning. If any assistance is needed, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well Made Brooms. ❤️🖤❤️
reviews.reviewText: Sweep well. Very Long handle on it. It’s Does what it supposed to do. At a Good Price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never saw myself getting excited over a broom until i got this bad boy right here. Sweep so good it sweeps me right out of my misery. Sweeps all my problems away. Sweeps me out of reality. I'll never buy another broom unless I'm forced to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good broom, not as good under tables and chair legs.
reviews.reviewText: Good broom for sweeping open areas. Did not work as well when trying to sweep mats or under tables and chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value and Quality
reviews.reviewText: This Tiumso Heavy Duty Broom was purchased to sweep leaves off my porch and patio. The 14 inch head and sturdy bristles do an excellent job of that. I put it together in all of five minutes, and the quality and light weight makes it a real joy to use. This broom is perfect for my purpose, but it would also make a good kitchen broom. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect Boom for me. The broom width is great the bristles are really strong. The handle is light but sturdy. I'm very happy with my purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: I was worried I would get a cheap broom seeing as how it comes in a small box and you have to put it together yourself! Odd right?!? However, this definitely does the job and is very sturdy. Only wish it came with a dustpan, however I knew it didn’t and still chose to purchase so I’m not taking away any stars for that. This is a good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars "Ease of use is questionable."
reviews.reviewText: I liked the looks and size of the broom. However, I found it difficult to use for outdoors tasks. I never did try it inside on the kitchen flooring. The two lower parts of the piping kept coming apart with the sweeping motion. One of the pole parts became stripped from constantly coming apart. This broom was expensive so I've decided to tape the pole joints together with electricians tape. If doing so doesn't solve the problem the trash barrel is most likely next step. Too bad, because it's a good looking product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We'll see if it lasts
reviews.reviewText: The broom was easy to assemble though the handle sections are not marked with section numbers (that I could see and I looked). I used logic and trial and error to assemble the broom. That said, I'm glad it was shipped in a small box inside a plastic shipping bag.In the past, the brooms I have purchased for outside eventually rust around the spot where the metal handle joins the plastic broom head. Invariably water gets into the broom head and rusts the handle to the point where it falls apart and can't be rejoined to the broom. Hopefully this one will be OK but I'm planning on taking some gorilla tape or similar product and wrapping the join to keep out the water.
